body.name: Astercook Chef Knife, 8 Inch Professional Kitchen Chef Knife, German High Carbon Stainless Steel Ultra Sharp Knife, Chefs Knives with Ergonomic Handle and Gift Box
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.
features: 【Professional Chef Knife】The Astercook 8" chef's knife can perform many kitchen cutting tasks and is suitable for home and professional use, cutting bread, vegetables, fruit, fish fillets or meat.

【Super Sharp Knife】Hand-polished by artisans with decades of experience and made of high quality German stainless steel. With a thickness of 2.5 mm, the chef's knife achieves the unity of sturdiness and sharpness to get the job done perfectly.

【Special Design】The ergonomic wooden handle greatly reduces wrist tension and creates a soft and comfortable grip. The smooth lines of the handle allow the hand to perfectly integrate with the knife while holding it, greatly improving comfort and chopping efficiency.

【Perfect Gift】This knife comes in a high quality black gift box, making it the perfect gift for an elder, loved one or friend. Plus, with the knife sheath, young children and other family members will be protected from harm. Note: It is not Damascus steel.
【Lifetime Warranty】 Each chef knife is backed by excellent quality and undergoes strict quality inspection, we offer a lifetime warranty to every customer, so please buy with confidence.
body.description: Astercook High Carbon German Stainless Steel Chef Knife Professional 8 Inch Chef's Knife The Astercook 8 inch chef's knife is designed for chefs, culinary professionals, food caterers, and the general public. It is a versatile kitchen knife ideal for a variety of tasks, including cutting, chopping, dicing and slicing vegetables, fruits, fish, meat and more. Ergonomic handle Ultra-sharp edge Strong and Durable Multi-functional Quite Balanced

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: About Astercook We have many years of experience in knife and are committed to providing our customers with the highest quality kitchen knives. With the goal of continuously improving the cooking experience of our customers. If you have any questions, please feel free to let us know, we are always here for you. Astercook High Carbon German Stainless Steel Chef Knife Professional 8 Inch Chef's Knife The Astercook 8 inch chef's knife is designed for chefs, culinary professionals, food caterers, and the general public. It is a versatile kitchen knife ideal for a variety of tasks, including cutting, chopping, dicing and slicing vegetables, fruits, fish, meat and more. Ergonomic handle Ultra-sharp edge Strong and Durable Multi-functional Quite Balanced

Ergonomic handle The handle has a good ergonomic design that reduces the possibility of finger pain and cramps, allowing you to cut comfortably. You will not feel uncomfortable because of its weight, especially after prolonged use. Strong and Durable Featuring a damascene pattern blade is particularly striking. Thanks to its design and chrome finish, it is also very elegant, allowing you to enjoy the beauty of the cooking process. Easy to Clean The chef's knife is easy to clean and maintain and can be cleaned with water and mild soap. It is recommended to wash by hand, not in the dishwasher After washing, wipe with a dry cloth until there are no water drops. Ultra-sharp edge High carbon stainless steel blades - The chef's knife is forged from high quality stainless steel, which can maintain its sharpness for a long time and prevent rusting and other functions.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exceptional Performance: Astercook Chef Knife
reviews.reviewText: The Astercook Chef Knife is a true kitchen essential that exceeded my expectations. This knife is a testament to quality craftsmanship and exceptional performance.Right from the moment I held the knife, I could feel its solid construction and ergonomic design. The handle provides a comfortable grip, allowing for precise control during cutting tasks. The balance of the knife is superb, making it effortless to maneuver through various ingredients.The blade of the Astercook Chef Knife is made of high-quality stainless steel that retains its sharpness remarkably well. It effortlessly glides through different types of food, whether it's slicing through meats, dicing vegetables, or chopping herbs. The sharpness and precision of this knife greatly enhance the overall cooking experience.Durability is another standout feature of the Astercook Chef Knife. Despite regular use, the blade remains resistant to corrosion and maintains its sharp edge. This knife is built to withstand the test of time, making it a reliable companion in the kitchen.Cleaning and maintenance are a breeze with this knife. It is easy to wipe clean and doesn't require much effort to keep in excellent condition. Additionally, its compact size makes it convenient to store in a knife block or drawer.In terms of value, the Astercook Chef Knife offers exceptional quality for its price point. Its performance rivals that of more expensive knives, making it a cost-effective choice for both professional chefs and home cooks.In conclusion, the Astercook Chef Knife is a remarkable kitchen tool that delivers outstanding performance. Its comfortable grip, sharpness, and durability make it a pleasure to use in any culinary task. If you're in search of a reliable and high-performing chef knife, the Astercook Chef Knife is definitely worth considering.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great knife so far
reviews.reviewText: Lighter weight than I expected. Comfortable to handle and super sharp!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Style is really nice and fits well
reviews.reviewText: Really like the wooden handle and it fits well in my small hands. Nice and lightweight, but has a good weight too. Nice length and easy to wash. My only complaint is that it's not quite as sharp as some of my other knives for fruit and vegetables. It's great on meat. The tip is definitely sharp. I still think it's a great knife for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best and the best
reviews.reviewText: It is great and its finish is authentic but very careful, it has some of the safest cuts I have found, an accident could quickly happen but everything else is incredible

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It was a gift to my brother in law who loves to cook. He told me he liked it and it was very sharp.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I can’t add a picture because it is currently wrapped in Christmas paper. I did inspect the knife when it came in. For such a low price it is a stunning piece of cutlery. I bought this for my daughter she’s currently taking culinary classes, she just turned 18 this is her first kitchen knife. I’m very satisfied with this knife the handle is beautiful, the Damascus pattern is way nicer than in the photos. Don’t judge this knife too harsh for the photos it is truly stunning, the type of steel and the length of the blade are both printed on the blade close to the handle by where a hilt would be. Beyond its look I wasn’t willing to use or test it so I can’t speak to how sharp it is, but if they put so much work into the appearance I’m sure the made sure it was razor sharp. I would highly recommend for a starter knife, I can’t wait to see my daughter’s face. Happy Holidays everyone!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars German or Chinese?
reviews.reviewText: Knife is sharp but thin, handle is very light. Package was put in a larger amazon box with other items. The knife box was not taped closed, so the knife was out of its box banging around the other shipped items... a piece of tape could've avoided this, seems cheap, but it WAS cheap so I guess that makes sense
